		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="invoice_url")]
		public string Invoice_url { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// An array of your invoice items
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="items")]
		public Invoice_Items[] Items { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// A URL to your logo image. Must be SSL hosted. https://sslimagehost.com is recommended
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="logo_url")]
		public string Logo_url { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Any notes attached to the invoice
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="notes")]
		public string Notes { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Optional, if the price is including VAT set the type to 'incl'. Otherwise the default is assumed as excluding VAT already, 'excl'
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="price_type")]
		public string Price_type { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Total amount excluding VAT
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="subtotal")]
		public int Subtotal { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// (or 'time of supply') if this is different from the invoice date
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="tax_point")]
		public string Tax_point { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Total amount of including VAT
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="total")]
		public int Total { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The type of invoice. Either 'sale' or 'refund'
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="type")]
		public string Type { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Your VAT number
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="vat_number")]
		public string Vat_number { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Total amount of VAT
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="vat_total")]
		public int Vat_total { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// To Zero-Rate the VAT, set to true.
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="zero_rated")]
		public string Zero_rated { get; set; }
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://fonlow.com/TestOpenApi/2024/01")]
	public class Update_Invoice
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="invoice")]
		public Retrieve_Invoice_Array Invoice { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Response code
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="status")]
		public string Status { get; set; }
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://fonlow.com/TestOpenApi/2024/01")]
	public class Update_Invoice_Array
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Your business address
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="business_address")]
		public string Business_address { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Your business name
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="business_name")]
		public string Business_name { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The rate of conversion at time of supply
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="conversion_rate")]
		public System.Nullable<System.Int32> Conversion_rate { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// 3 character currency code for invoice
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="currency_code")]
		public string Currency_code { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// 3 character currency code to be converted from original transaction currency
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="currency_code_conversion")]
		public string Currency_code_conversion { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Your customers address
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="customer_address")]
		public string Customer_address { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Your customers name or trading name
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="customer_name")]
		public string Customer_name { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Customers VAT number
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="customervat_number")]
		public string Customervat_number { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The date the invoice was issued
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="date")]
		public string Date { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The discount rate per item
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="discount_rate")]
		public string Discount_rate { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// An array of your invoice items
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="items")]
		public Invoice_Items[] Items { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// A URL to your logo image. Must be SSL hosted. https://sslimagehost.com is recommended
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="logo_url")]
		public string Logo_url { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Add a note to the invoice.
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="notes")]
		public string Notes { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// (or 'time of supply') if this is different from the invoice date
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="tax_point")]
		public string Tax_point { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// The type of invoice. Either 'sale' or 'refund'
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="type")]
		public string Type { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Your VAT number
		/// </summary>
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="vat_number")]
		public string Vat_number { get; set; }
	}
	
	[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataContract(Namespace="http://fonlow.com/TestOpenApi/2024/01")]
	public class Vat_Rates
	{
		
		/// <summary>
		/// An array of the EU VAT countries and their respective rates
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="countries")]
		public Vat_Rates_Countries[] Countries { get; set; }
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Response code
		/// Required
		/// </summary>
		[System.ComponentModel.DataAnnotations.Required()]
		[System.Runtime.Serialization.DataMember(Name="status")]
		public int Status { get; set; }
	}

	{

	public partial class Misc
	{
		
		private System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient;
		
		private JsonSerializerSettings jsonSerializerSettings;
		
		public Misc(System.Net.Http.HttpClient httpClient, JsonSerializerSettings jsonSerializerSettings=null)
		{
			if (httpClient == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("Null HttpClient.", "httpClient");

			if (httpClient.BaseAddress == null)
				throw new ArgumentNullException("HttpClient has no BaseAddress", "httpClient");

			this.httpClient = httpClient;
			this.jsonSerializerSettings = jsonSerializerSettings;
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Retrieve a countries VAT rates by its 2 digit country code
		/// Country_code_check country-code-check
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="code">The 2 digit country code</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Country_code_checkAsync(string code)
		{
			var requestUri = "country-code-check?code=" + (code==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(code));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Convert a currency
		/// Currency_conversion currency-conversion
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="currency_from">The currency code you are converting from</param>
		/// <param name="currency_to">The currency code you are converting to</param>
		/// <param name="amount">Optional, an amount you are wanting to convert. Leave blank to just get the current rate</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Currency_conversionAsync(string currency_from, string currency_to, int amount)
		{
			var requestUri = "currency-conversion?currency_from=" + (currency_from==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(currency_from))+"&currency_to=" + (currency_to==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(currency_to))+"&amount="+amount;
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Create a VAT invoice
		/// Create_invoice invoice
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="requestBody">Enter invoice data as JSON</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Create_invoiceAsync(Invoice_Data requestBody)
		{
			var requestUri = "invoice";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Post, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Retrieve an invoice
		/// Get_invoice invoice/{id}
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="id">Enter the invoice id</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Get_invoiceAsync(int id)
		{
			var requestUri = "invoice/"+id;
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Update an existing invoice
		/// Invoice_update invoice/{id}
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="id">Enter an invoice id</param>
		/// <param name="requestBody">Enter invoice data as JSON</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Invoice_updateAsync(int id, Update_Invoice_Array requestBody)
		{
			var requestUri = "invoice/"+id;
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Put, requestUri))
			{
			using (var requestWriter = new System.IO.StringWriter())
			{
			var requestSerializer = JsonSerializer.Create(jsonSerializerSettings);
			requestSerializer.Serialize(requestWriter, requestBody);
			var content = new System.Net.Http.StringContent(requestWriter.ToString(), System.Text.Encoding.UTF8, "application/json");
			httpRequestMessage.Content = content;
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Delete an invoice
		/// Invoice_delete invoice/{id}
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="id">Enter an invoice id</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Invoice_deleteAsync(int id)
		{
			var requestUri = "invoice/"+id;
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Delete, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Retrieve a countries VAT rates from an IP address
		/// Ip_check ip-check
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="address">The IP address to search against</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Ip_checkAsync(string address)
		{
			var requestUri = "ip-check?address=" + (address==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(address));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Check api requests remaining on current subscription plan
		/// Api_usage usage-check
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Api_usageAsync()
		{
			var requestUri = "usage-check";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Validate a VAT number
		/// <p>We highly recommend if you are able, to check a VAT number on your end first to save wasted API lookups. It maybe that your customer has simply entered the wrong format. <a href='http://www.braemoor.co.uk/software/vat.shtml' target='_blank'>Heres a client side way to check the format using Javascript</a></p>
		/// Vat_number_validate vat-number-check
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="vatid">The VAT number to validate</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Vat_number_validateAsync(string vatid)
		{
			var requestUri = "vat-number-check?vatid=" + (vatid==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(vatid));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Convert a price to or from VAT price.
		/// Convert_price vat-price
		/// </summary>
		/// <param name="code">The 2 digit country code</param>
		/// <param name="country_rate">The VAT rate to get the price for. Default: standard</param>
		/// <param name="price">The price you want converting</param>
		/// <param name="type">Optional, if the price is including VAT set the type to 'incl'. Otherwise the default is assumed as excluding VAT already, 'excl'</param>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Convert_priceAsync(string code, string country_rate, int price, string type)
		{
			var requestUri = "vat-price?code=" + (code==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(code))+"&country_rate=" + (country_rate==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(country_rate))+"&price="+price+"&type=" + (type==null? "" : System.Uri.EscapeDataString(type));
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
		
		/// <summary>
		/// Retrieve all current EU VAT rates
		/// Vat_rates vat-rates
		/// </summary>
		/// <returns>No response was specified</returns>
		public async Task Vat_ratesAsync()
		{
			var requestUri = "vat-rates";
			using (var httpRequestMessage = new System.Net.Http.HttpRequestMessage(System.Net.Http.HttpMethod.Get, requestUri))
			{
			var responseMessage = await httpClient.SendAsync(httpRequestMessage);
			try
			{
				responseMessage.EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx();
			}
			finally
			{
				responseMessage.Dispose();
			}
			}
		}
	}
}

namespace Fonlow.Net.Http
{
	using System.Net.Http;

	public class WebApiRequestException : HttpRequestException
	{
		public System.Net.HttpStatusCode StatusCode { get; private set; }

		public string Response { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders Headers { get; private set; }

		public System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue ContentType { get; private set; }

		public WebApiRequestException(string message, System.Net.HttpStatusCode statusCode, string response, System.Net.Http.Headers.HttpResponseHeaders headers, System.Net.Http.Headers.MediaTypeHeaderValue contentType) : base(message)
		{
			StatusCode = statusCode;
			Response = response;
			Headers = headers;
			ContentType = contentType;
		}
	}

	public static class ResponseMessageExtensions
	{
		public static void EnsureSuccessStatusCodeEx(this HttpResponseMessage responseMessage)
		{
			if (!responseMessage.IsSuccessStatusCode)
			{
				var responseText = responseMessage.Content.ReadAsStringAsync().Result;
				var contentType = responseMessage.Content.Headers.ContentType;
				throw new WebApiRequestException(responseMessage.ReasonPhrase, responseMessage.StatusCode, responseText, responseMessage.Headers, contentType);
			}
		}
	}
}
